summary: fe-006 RTL Layout + Hebrew Translations is complete and ready for QA validation.
deliverables: src/App.tsx — RTL dir toggle via useEffect
All components — directional Tailwind classes replaced with logical properties

qa_test_cases.description: Switch language to Hebrew in Settings
qa_test_cases.expected: HTML dir attribute becomes 'rtl', layout mirrors correctly, all text appears in Hebrew

qa_test_cases.description: Switch back to English from Hebrew
steps: While in Hebrew mode, open Settings
qa_test_cases.expected: HTML dir becomes 'ltr', layout returns to LTR, no visual regressions

steps: Tap the Master List button to open the drawer
qa_test_cases.expected: Drawer slides in from the RIGHT (correct for RTL); closes to the right

qa_test_cases.description: Hebrew text on all main screens
steps: Navigate to Shopping, Tasks, Vouchers/Reservations, Settings screens
qa_test_cases.expected: All UI text is in Hebrew; no English strings visible (except proper nouns)

qa_test_cases.description: Voucher card delete/image buttons in RTL
steps: Open a voucher list with a voucher that has an image
Open voucher form with an image uploaded
qa_test_cases.expected: Remove image button appears at top-end (top-right in LTR = top-left in RTL); image size label at bottom-start

qa_test_cases.description: Checkbox positioning in VouchersHub edit mode
steps: Tap edit mode (long press or edit button)
Observe selection checkboxes on list cards
qa_test_cases.expected: Checkboxes appear at top-end (top-left in RTL)

steps: Switch to Hebrew via URL or default
qa_test_cases.expected: Auth screen labels and buttons appear in Hebrew
No layout regressions; all classes work identically to pre-fe-006
